Text: It's getting really bothersome for us Trillian users that we have to keep downloading these cracks every other day.  What does Cerulean Studios think they're accomplishing, making us unable to use a not-ugly Theme?
haha! so that's the only limitation away from the full version, a theme? coz it's getting kinda boring... nah, I don't mind as long as Xx666xX doesn't get tired either, working great man, thx!
Thanks for the upload, though I'm not sure how much longer I want to put up with downloading cracks every few days. Astra isn't really worth the hassle, in my opinion.
THX for Relise. But now actual 117 build :-(
